channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Batman Intruder

item.title: Man fakes cancer diagnosis in attempt to win back ex-wife

item.title: CBS News Presents: A Town Hall with Erika Kirk
item.description: Erika Kirk opens up about life, loss and political discourse after her husband Charlie's assassination. Watch the town hall, moderated by Bari Weiss.

item.title: United Airlines flight returns to Dulles airport after engine loses power during takeoff
item.description: Shortly after departing the Virginia airport on Saturday, the Tokyo-bound plane's engine cover separated and caught fire, according to the transportat...

item.title: Skywatchers rejoice: The Geminids meteor shower peaks tonight
item.description: The Geminids meteor shower appears every December, but it will peak this year on Saturday, the 13th.

item.title: After failure in the Senate, House GOP has its own health care proposal
item.description: House Republicans released proposed legislation late Friday that would not extend enhanced Affordable Care Act tax subsidies.

item.title: 2 killed and 9 injured in Brown University shooting, no suspect in custody

item.title: Belarus frees 123 prisoners as US lifts sanctions
item.description: Opposition activist Maria Kolesnikova is among those released in exchange for a deal with the US.

item.title: Three Americans killed by IS gunman in Syria, US military says
item.description: Two US soldiers and a civilian interpreter were killed in the attack, according to the US Central Command.

item.title: BBC captures celebrations as Belarus frees political prisoners
item.description: Southern & Eastern Europe correspondent Sarah Rainsford reports from Lithuania, where some of the released prisoners were taken.

item.title: Israel targets senior Hamas official in deadly Gaza strike
item.description: The strike killed Raed Saad, a senior commander in Hamas' Qassam Brigades, the Israeli military said.

item.title: Angry fans throw chairs and bottles at Messi event in India
item.description: The Inter Miami and Argentina forward is in India for a tour, taking in events in Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai and Delhi.
